Q_DESC:
John is very fond of functions in C programming. He is also interested in shapes and figures. Help him to write a C program using the concept of functions that helps him to identify the 3rd angle of  a  triangle .Read the other 2 angles as input   using the input data that consists of  two angles of the triangle.
Input :  2 angles as positive integers - n1  n2 say  45  45. Output:  "Third angle of the triangle : 90" The 3rd angle, if n <0 print"Invalid Input",   check for the input constraints. If n is not a number print    "Invalid Input"
